com.sponsorpay.publisher.currency

Class SPVirtualCurrencyConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sponsorpay.publisher.currency.SPVirtualCurrencyConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SPCurrencyServerRequester.SPVCSResultListener

    public class SPVirtualCurrencyConnector
extends Object
implements SPCurrencyServerRequester.SPVCSResultListener

    Provides services to access SponsorPay's Virtual Currency Server.

      • SPVirtualCurrencyConnector

        public SPVirtualCurrencyConnector(Context context,
                          String credentialsToken,
                          SPCurrencyServerListener currencyServerListener)
        Initializes a new instance with the provided context and application data.
        Parameters:
        context - Android application context.
        credentialsToken - The token identifying the SPCredentials to be used.
        currencyServerListener - SPCurrencyServerListener registered by the developer code to be notified of the result of requests to the Virtual Currency Server.

        Parameters:
        currency - the custom currency name
        Returns:

      • fetchDeltaOfCoins

        public void fetchDeltaOfCoins()
        Sends a request to the SponsorPay currency server to obtain the variation in amount of virtual currency for a given user since the last time this method was called. The response will be delivered to one of the registered listener's callback methods.

      • fetchDeltaOfCoinsForCurrentUserSinceTransactionId

        public void fetchDeltaOfCoinsForCurrentUserSinceTransactionId(String transactionId,
                                                     String currencyId)
        Sends a request to the SponsorPay currency server to obtain the variation in amount of virtual currency for the current user's transactions newer than the one whose ID is passed. The response will be delivered to one of the registered listener's callback methods.
        Parameters:
        transactionId - Optionally, provide the ID of the latest known transaction. The delta of coins will be calculated from this transaction (not included) up to the present. Leave it to null to let the SDK use the latest transaction ID it kept track of.
        currencyId - Optionally, provide the ID of the currency that you want to retrieve. If the provided ID is empty or null, then the default currency will be requested. If an invalid currency ID will be provided then you will receive an invalid application error.

      • shouldShowToastNotification

        public static void shouldShowToastNotification(boolean showNotification)
        Indicates whether the toast notification should be shown after a successful query
        Parameters:
        showNotification -
